[#AbstractObject]
= AbstractObject

|===
|Element |Description

|Type
|Class

|Name
|AbstractObject

|IRI
|http://www.ontology.asam.net/Core#AbstractObject

|Subclass of
|Thing

|Disjoint with
|SpatioTemporalExtent

|Comments
|DEF: A thing that does not exist in space or time. Abstract objects are used to express characteristics of spatio-temporal extents, such as properties and roles.

EXAMPLES: not applicable.

USAGE: This class will generally not be used directly in the OpenX domain.

link:http://www.informationjunction.co.uk/hqdm_framework/hqdm_framework/lexical/abstract_object.htm[Reference to HQDM abstract_object]
